refnamediv.refpurpose: This function computes the inverse 2-D discrete cosine transform of input matrix.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: Y = idct2(X) Y = idct2(X, M, N) Y = idct2(X, [M, N])

listitem.para: If specified Matrix X is padded with M rows and N columns.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function computes the inverse 2-D discrete cosine transform of matrix X. If M and N are specified, the input is either padded or truncated to have M rows and N columns.
